param.name: regemailbody
param.default:
Hello [USERNAME],
We would like to notify you that a new user account has been
created for you on [SITENAME] with the following details:

Username: [USERNAME]
Password: [PASSWORD]

This user account will remain blocked until your subscription payment is completed and validated.

Should you need to access your account sooner than that - for
example, you did not complete the payment and would like to
subscribe using the same username and/or email address -
please click on the following activation link to enable your user
account so that you are able to login in the designated
area of the subscription form using the username and password
printed in this email.

[URL]

If the URL above is not clickable, please copy and paste it to your browser.

Best regards,
[SITENAME]
